attributes.action: Sort out Manchester LEA and bring back Miss Jones!!!!
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
At Parrswood High School something very silly has happend. They hired a new headteacher when all the students were fine and only wanted Ms Jones.
We don't care about the politics, just bring back Ms Jones who we all like. Or explain why she has had to go as well!!!

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
